title: சேலம் 8 வழிச் சாலையை அனுமதிக்க தருமபுரி எம்பி கோரிக்கையா ?
subtitle: சேலம் 8 வழிச் சாலையை அனுமதிக்க தருமபுரி எம்பி கோரிக்கையா ? - YouTurn - Fake News Checker Online.
author: youturn.in
vclaim:
Met Minister Thiru Nitin regarding #8waylane Krishnagir. Dharmapuri-Thoppur-Salem. #4waylane Thopput-Bhavani. #Flyover at Pudur Karimangalam n Gundalpatti #Pilot_project to plant trees in centre median of NHAI in Dpi. All demands accepted n he suggested Eucalyptus trees.😊 pic.twitter.com/yHQ2bmUikq

Letter copy of 8 lane expansion of existing 4 lane Krishnagiri-Dharmapuri-Thoppur-Salem given to Road and Highways Minister Thiru Nitin.This lane has increased congestion of traffic esp lorry traffic as this serves as gateway to Kerala and Karnataka and has very high fatalities. pic.twitter.com/WPMZNgIDvl
